consentModal.title: We value your privacy
consentModal.description: We use cookies and other technologies to enhance your experience, provide essential functionality, and analyze our website's performance. By clicking “Accept All”, you agree to the use of all cookies and technologies.
consentModal.footer: Privacy PolicyTerms and Conditions

sections.title: Cookie Usage
sections.description: Cookies help us provide core functionality, personalize your experience, and analyze our app's performance. Some cookies are essential for our app to function, while others can be disabled.

sections.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Enabled
sections.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to operate and cannot be turned off. They are typically set in response to actions made by you, such as setting your privacy preferences.

sections.title: Functionality Cookies
sections.description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferred translation language.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.description: We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website. This information helps us improve our services and your experience on our site.

body.name: _ga, _gid
body.description: Used to distinguish users and analyze site traffic.

sections.title: Advertisement Cookies
sections.description: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you. They may also limit how often you see an ad and measure the effectiveness of an ad campaign.

sections.title: More information
sections.description: For any queries about how we use cookies, please visit our Privacy Policy.
